title: Justin Bieber breaks his own selfie ban for COPS as he 'buys officers some coffee'
text:
Celebs Justin Bieber breaks his own selfie ban for COPS as he 'buys officers some coffee' The singer looked happy to pose for a picture after previously telling fans he felt like a zoo animal Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Justin Bieber looks to have temporarily ended his self-imposed public selfie ban - if you're a cop, at least. 
The Love Yourself singer made the controversial decision last year to stop fans taking pictures with him , and insisted it would be the "only way he lasts" in the spotlight. 
He compared himself at the time to a "zoo animal", and announced he would no longer stop for photos - but it looks like that could all be in the past. 
Justin has been seen posing for selfies with a police officers in a coffee shop this week, and he looked happy to be doing it. Read More 
According to TMZ, the pop star went on a coffee run on Saturday night in Mission Viejo, and happened to bump into the cops, who were also waiting in line. Justin Bieber put a ban on selfies and photos with fans (Photo: Getty) Could he be changing his ways? (Photo: Splash News) 
It's said Justin even offered to cover the orders, and the baristas were given a sweet $10 tip. Read More Fans go wild as Rita Ora and Justin Bieber collaborate on a song together 
He announced his decision to halt selfies with fans last year, and he made the revelation on Instagram. 
“If you happen to see me out somewhere know that I’m not gonna take a picture I’m done taking pictures,” he wrote. 
"It has gotten to the point that people won’t even say hi to me or recognise me as a human, I feel like a zoo animal, and I wanna be able to keep my sanity.” 
Not holding back, the singer added that he doesn’t owe his supporters anything and said nowhere does it say fans are allowed to get photos with him. 
"I realize people will be disappointed but I don’t owe anybody a picture. And people who say 'but I bought ur album' know that you got my album and you got what you paid for AN ALBUM! It doesn’t say in fine print whenever you see me you also get a photo. Justin Bieber." Like us on Facebook
